TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit RSACng extends System.Security.Cryptography.RSA
Public NotInheritable Class RSACng Inherits RSA
public ref class RSACng sealed : System::Security::Cryptography::RSA

summary.span: 提供 RSA 算法的下一代加密技术(CNG)实现。

span.span: Provides a Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) implementation of the RSA algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自 类。The class is derived from the class. 因此，它不是 现有用途的下拉替换。Therefore, it is not a drop-in replacement for existing uses of . 使用类似于 类而不是 类的编程模型。 uses a programming model that is similar to the class rather than the class. 例如：For example: - 使用的密钥由单独的 对象管理。The key used by is managed by a separate object. 与此相反， 有一个直接与类型本身的操作相关联的键。In contrast, has a key that is directly tied to the operations of the type itself. - 通过使用 对象的属性来执行此类操作，例如签名和验证签名，就像 使用其对象属性控制签名和验证操作一样。 performs such operations as signing and verifying signatures by using properties of the object, just as uses its object properties to control signing and verification operations. > [!NOTE] > 类是使用 Windows CNG 库的 RSA 算法的实现，在 Windows 以外的操作系统上不可用。The class is an implementation of the RSA algorithm using the Windows CNG libraries and isn't available on operating systems other than Windows. 对于不执行 Windows 互操作的应用程序，建议使用 ，而不是直接引用此类型。For applications which aren't doing Windows interop, you're encouraged to use instead of referencing this type directly.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 使用随机的 2,048 位密钥对初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a random 2,048-bit key pair.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数不会立即生成新的公共/专用密钥对。This constructor does not generate a new public/private keypair immediately. 此构造函数将 属性设置为2048，并在需要某个键时使用属性值生成一个键。This constructor sets the property to 2048 and when a key is needed one is generated using the property value. 如果通过 方法或其他密钥导入方法加载密钥，则此构造函数中的密钥大小没有任何意义。If a key is loaded via the method, or other key import method, the key size from this constructor has no meaning.

Public Sub New (keySize As Integer)
public: RSACng(int keySize);

param.name: keySize
param.span: 要生成的密钥的大小(以位为单位)。

span.span: The size of the key to generate in bits.

summary.span: 使用具有指定大小的随机生成密钥初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a randomly generated key of the specified size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效密钥大小范围为384到16384位，增量为8。Valid key sizes range from 384 to 16,384 bits, in increments of 8. 建议为所有密钥使用最小大小2048位。We recommend that a minimum size of 2,048 bits be used for all keys. 此构造函数不会立即生成新的公共/专用密钥对。This constructor does not generate a new public/private keypair immediately. 此构造函数将 属性设置为 `keySize`，需要使用该属性值生成一个密钥。This constructor sets the property to `keySize` and when a key is needed one is generated using the property value. 如果通过 方法或其他密钥导入方法加载密钥，则此构造函数中的密钥大小没有任何意义。If a key is loaded via the method, or other key import method, the key size from this constructor has no meaning.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须 `key` 的 。The of `key` must be . 此构造函数创建密钥的副本。This constructor creates a copy of the key. 即使 `key` 已释放，RSA 中此密钥对象的副本仍保持活动状态。Even if `key` is disposed, the copy of this key object in RSA remains alive.

exception.span: 不是有效的 RSA 密钥。

span.span: is not a valid RSA key.

summary.span: 通过创建为参数结构创建新的 ，来替换当前实例使用的现有密钥。

span.span: Replaces the existing key that the current instance is working with by creating a new for the parameters structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `parameters` 只包含指数和模数，则只导入公钥。If `parameters` contains only an exponent and modulus, only a public key is imported. 如果 `parameters` 还包含 P 和 Q 值，则将导入完整密钥对。If `parameters` also contains P and Q values, a full key pair is imported. 此方法使用指定的参数生成新的临时 RSA 密钥对象，并使用新密钥替换 值，任何已打开的密钥都不受此方法的影响。This method builds a new ephemeral RSA key object using the specified parameters and replaces the value with the new key, any already open key is unaffected by this method.

exception.span: 既不包含指数，也不包含模数。

span.span: contains neither an exponent nor a modulus.

exception.span: 不是有效的 RSA 密钥。

span.span: is not a valid RSA key.

exception.span: 是一个完整的密钥对并使用默认的 KSP。

span.span: is a full key pair and the default KSP is used.

summary.span: 获取将由 对象用于它执行的任何加密操作的密钥。

span.span: Gets the key that will be used by the object for any cryptographic operation that it performs.
The key used by the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果重置了键，则将释放返回的 对象，例如，通过更改 属性，使用 创建新的键，或者通过释放父 对象来释放。The returned object is disposed if the key is reset, for instance by changing the property, by using the to create a new key, or by disposing of the parent object. 因此，应确保在这些情况下不会再使用该密钥对象。Therefore, you should ensure that the key object is no longer used in these cases. 如果使用了该构造函数，则此 对象与传递到 构造函数的 对象不相同。This object is not the same as the object passed to the constructor, if that constructor was used. 但是，它会指向同一 CNG 密钥。However, it will point to the same CNG key.
